sections.title: Information Collected
sections.content: Our game collects the following data through Google Play Games Services:
items: User IDs: For authentication and cloud save
Performance data: Crash logs and diagnostics

sections.title: How We Use Data
sections.content: We use the collected data for:
items: Analytics: Game improvements and bug fixes

sections.title: Data Sharing
sections.content: We do not share your data with third parties. Google Play Games Services processes data on our behalf as a service provider.

sections.title: Security
sections.content: All data is encrypted in transit via HTTPS/TLS.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: You can request deletion of your data by emailing: contact@example.com
